lyric:
[by:蛤族老公猪]
[00:01]I still remember
[00:03]loving in the danger
[00:05]you set me on fire
[00:07]when I’m by your side
[00:10]takin’ me higher
[00:12]I’ll follow you down if you go now
[00:15]And you say you wanna get away
[00:17]you wanna take me all the way
[00:20]when you get burned if you get closer
[00:23]to the sun I want ya
[00:26]we can burn to get the fading into one another
[00:37]Oh don’t you know
[00:38]Just love and call me
[00:40]baby we could run free
[00:43]if you do it just the way I like
[00:46]maybe I could waste my time
[00:48]on you
[00:49]Never mind all the world reads
[00:52]if you do it just the way I like
[00:55]maybe I could waste my time
[00:57]on you
[01:20]My deepest secrets
[01:22]trust you to keep them
[01:24]hide in the words I can not say
[01:29]I got what you wanted
[01:32]I got what you needed
[01:34]It’s all in the way
[01:35]that you say my name
[01:39]when you get burned if you get closer
[01:42]to the sun I want ya
[01:45]we can burn to get the fading into one another
[01:55]Oh don’t you know
[01:57]Just love and call me
[01:59]baby we could run free
[02:02]if you do it just the way I like
[02:05]maybe I could waste my time
[02:07]on you
[02:09]Never mind all the world reads
[02:11]if you do it just the way I like
[02:14]maybe I could waste my time
[02:17]on you
[02:31]if you do it just the way I like
[02:34]maybe I could waste my time
[02:36]on you
[02:38]Never mind all the world reads
[02:41]if you do it just the way I like
[02:44]maybe I could waste my time
[02:46] on you
tlyric:
[by:吃鱼还是吃梨]
[00:01]我依然记得
[00:03]在危难中也坚持着爱情
[00:05]你点燃了我热血沸腾的爱意
[00:07]当我陪伴在侧
[00:10]带我飞向更高
[00:12]若你此刻离开 我会沿路跟随
[00:15]你说你想离开
[00:17]你想一路带我跟随
[00:20]若你靠近些 会被灼伤
[00:23]阳光下 我渴望着你
[00:26]我们可以尽情燃起似火爱意 直到感觉逐渐消失
[00:37]你难道不知道么
[00:38]就深爱着我 呼唤我
[00:40]呼唤我为你的宝贝 我们就能自在欢愉
[00:43]若你按照我喜欢的方式来
[00:46]也许我愿意 虚度光阴
[00:48]为你
[00:49]没关系 就让全世界看到
[00:52]若你按照我喜欢的方式来
[00:55]也许我愿意 虚度光阴
[00:57]为你
[01:20]我最深处的秘密
[01:22]我信任着你并交付于你保护
[01:24]我无法说出的 言语之间的隐秘
[01:29]我有着你渴望的全部
[01:32]也有着你的全部所需
[01:34]这一切都流露在
[01:35]当你深情唤出我名
[01:39]若你靠近些 会被灼伤
[01:42]阳光下 我渴望着你
[01:45]我们可以尽情燃起似火爱意 直到感觉逐渐消失
[01:55]你难道不知道么
[01:57]就深爱着我 呼唤我
[01:59]呼唤我为你的宝贝 我们就能自由欢愉

[02:05]也许我愿意 虚度光阴
[02:07]为你
[02:09]没关系 就让全世界看到

[02:14]也许我愿意 虚度光阴
